text: The presence of vectors in their developmental stages on a property, or in a vessel, container, or other structure on a property, shall be prima facie evidence of a public health nuisance.

title.text: Environmental and Animal Control and Protection (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Prima facie evidence of a public health nuisance.
